name: ACTION Dashboard
description:
A dashboard for the Batangas State University's ACTION Center.
Monitors and keeps track of building status and inspector generated reports.

Features:
 - Real-time building status monitoring
 - Report generation and management
 - User management and authentication
 - Recaptcha verification
 - Image upload and storage
 - Dockerized deployment
 - Azure Blob Storage integration
 - Cloudflare Pages deployment

name: ACTION Companion
description:
A mobile companion app for the Batangas State University's ACTION Center.
Allows inspectors to generate reports and monitor building status.

Features:
 - Campus-based information isolation
 - Real-time building status monitoring
 - Report collection and submission
 - Recaptcha verification
 - Image upload and storage
 - Dockerized deployment
 - Azure Blob Storage integration
 - Cloudflare Pages deployment

name: MiniEngine
description:
An experimental 2D Game Engine written in C# and SDL2.
Features an Entity-Component-System architecture and a simple scripting API.

Features:
 - Entity-Component-System architecture
 - Simple scripting API
 - SDL2 rendering
 - Virtualized File System
 - Asset & Scene Management
 - Extensible Plugin System
 - Cross-platform support

name: Cerulean
description: A cross-platform UI framework for developing desktop applications using C# and XML.

name: IRIS Surveillance System
description:
A real-time surveillance system that uses AI to detect and recognize PPE and equipment in a school laboratory setting.

Features:
 - Real-time object detection
 - Object recognition
 - Object tracking
 - User management and authentication
 - Data Aggregation and Visualization

This project was developed as a research project for the Batangas State University.

Responsibilities:
 - AI Model Training
 - Backend Development
 - Deployment
 - Video Processing
 - Data Visualization
